lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: When was the last time this country hosted the Olympic Games?
lyrics.translation: 这个国家上次举办奥运会是什么时候？

lyrics.text: The Olympic Games will be held in our country in four years' time.
lyrics.translation: 四年后，奥运会将在我们国家举行。

lyrics.text: As a great many people will be visiting the country, the government will be building new hotels, an immense stadium, and a new Olympic standard swimming pool.
lyrics.translation: 由于将有许多人访问这个国家，政府将建造新的酒店、一个巨大的体育场和一个符合奥林匹克标准的新游泳池。

lyrics.text: They will also be building new roads and a special railway line.
lyrics.translation: 他们还将建造新的道路和一条特殊的铁路线。

lyrics.text: The Games will be held just outside the capital and the whole area will be called Olympic City.
lyrics.translation: 运动会将在首都外举行，整个区域将被称为奥林匹克城。

lyrics.text: Workers will have completed the new roads by the end of this year.
lyrics.translation: 工人们将在年底前完成新路的建设。

lyrics.text: By the end of next year, they will have finished work on the new stadium.
lyrics.translation: 到明年年底，他们将完成新体育场的工作。

lyrics.text: The fantastic modern buildings have been designed by Kurt Gunter.
lyrics.translation: 这些奇妙的现代建筑是由库尔特·冈特设计的。

lyrics.text: Everybody will be watching anxiously as the new buildings go up.
lyrics.translation: 每个人都会焦急地注视着新建筑的建成。

lyrics.text: We are all very excited and are looking forward to the Olympic Games because they have never been held before in this country.
lyrics.translation: 我们都非常兴奋，并且期待着奥运会，因为在这个国家以前从未举办过。
